--- description: Create a boilerplate for a new project using Cloudflare Workers + Remix + D1 + Prisma --- # Create Cloudflare Fullstack App æ–°è¦ãƒ•ãƒ«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã®ãƒœã‚¤ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹ã‚³ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ã§ã™ã€‚ ## Context ã“ã®ã‚³ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ã¯ä»¥ä¸‹ã®æŠ€è¡“ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ãŸæ–°è¦ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã‚’ç”Ÿæˆã—ã¾ã™ï¼š - **Frontend**: Remix on Cloudflare Pages - **Backend API**: Hono on Cloudflare Workers - **Database**: D1 (SQLite) + Prisma ORM - **UI**: shadcn/ui + Tailwind CSS - **Monorepo**: Turborepo + pnpm workspaces - **Authentication**: Google OAuth + JWT (ã‚ªãƒ—ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³) ## Process ### 1. ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆæƒ…å ±ã®ç¢ºèª ã¾ãšã€ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã«ä»¥ä¸‹ã®æƒ…å ±ã‚’è³ªå•ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ï¼š **å¿…é ˆé …ç›®**: - ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆåï¼ˆä¾‹: `my-app`, `inventory-system`ï¼‰ - ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªï¼ˆä¾‹: `~/projects/my-app`ï¼‰ **ã‚ªãƒ—ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³é …ç›®**: - èªè¨¼æ©Ÿèƒ½ã®æœ‰ç„¡ï¼ˆGoogle OAuth + JWTï¼‰ - åˆæœŸã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ†ã‚£ï¼ˆä¾‹: Users, Products, Ordersï¼‰ ### 2. ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªæ§‹é€ ã®ä½œæˆ ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªæ§‹é€ ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã™ï¼š ``` {project-name}/ â”œâ”€â”€ apps/ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ api/ # Hono (Cloudflare Workers) â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ src/ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ index.ts # ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒªãƒ¼ãƒã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒˆ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ routes/ # API routes â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ middleware/ # èªè¨¼ãƒ»ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒªãƒ³ã‚° â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ lib/ # ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒªãƒ†ã‚£ â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ wrangler.toml # Cloudflare Workersè¨­å®š â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ package.json â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ tsconfig.json â”‚ â””â”€â”€ web/ # Remix (Cloudflare Pages) â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ app/ â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ routes/ # ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒˆ â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ components/ # UI components â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ lib/ # API client, utilities â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ root.tsx # ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ public/ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ package.json â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ remix.config.js â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ tsconfig.json â”‚ â””â”€â”€ tailwind.config.ts â”œâ”€â”€ packages/ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ database/ # Prisma â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ prisma/ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ schema.prisma # ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒ â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ migrations/ # D1 migrations â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ package.json â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ tsconfig.json â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ shared/ # å…±æœ‰å‹ãƒ»å®šæ•° â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ src/ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ constants/ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ schemas/ # Zod schemas â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ index.ts â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ package.json â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ tsconfig.json â”‚ â””â”€â”€ ui/ # shadcn/ui components â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ src/ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ package.json â”‚ â””â”€â”€ tsconfig.json â”œâ”€â”€ docs/ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ specs/ â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ features/ â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ backlog/ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ implementation/ â”œâ”€â”€ .gitignore â”œâ”€â”€ package.json # Root package.json â”œâ”€â”€ pnpm-workspace.yaml # pnpm workspaces â”œâ”€â”€ turbo.json # Turborepo config â”œâ”€â”€ PLAN.md # ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆè¨ˆç”» â”œâ”€â”€ README.md â””â”€â”€ CLAUDE.md # Claude Codeç”¨ã‚¬ã‚¤ãƒ‰ ``` ### 3. Rootè¨­å®šãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã®ç”Ÿæˆ #### 3.1 package.json (Root) ```json { "name": "{project-name}", "version": "0.1.0", "private": true, "scripts": { "dev": "turbo dev", "build": "turbo build", "typecheck": "turbo typecheck", "db:generate": "turbo db:generate", "db:migrate": "cd packages/database && npm run migrate" }, "devDependencies": { "turbo": "^2.3.3", "typescript": "^5.7.2" }, "packageManager": "pnpm@9.15.0", "engines": { "node": ">=20.0.0", "pnpm": ">=9.0.0" } } ``` #### 3.2 pnpm-workspace.yaml ```yaml packages: - "apps/*" - "packages/*" ``` #### 3.3 turbo.json ```json { "$schema": "https://turbo.build/schema.json", "globalDependencies": ["**/.env"], "tasks": { "build": { "dependsOn": ["^build"], "outputs": [".next/**", "dist/**", ".remix/**"] }, "dev": { "cache": false, "persistent": true }, "typecheck": { "dependsOn": ["^build"] }, "db:generate": { "cache": false } } } ``` #### 3.4 .gitignore ```gitignore # Dependencies node_modules/ .pnp .pnp.js # Build outputs dist/ .next/ .remix/ .wrangler/ .vercel/ # Environment .env .env.local .dev.vars # Database *.db *.db-journal .wrangler/state/ # IDE .vscode/ .idea/ *.swp *.swo *~ # OS .DS_Store Thumbs.db # Logs *.log npm-debug.log* # Turbo .turbo/ ``` ### 4. Backend API (Hono) ã®ç”Ÿæˆ #### 4.1 apps/api/package.json ```json { "name": "@{project-name}/api", "version": "0.1.0", "private": true, "type": "module", "scripts": { "dev": "wrangler dev", "build": "wrangler deploy --dry-run --outdir=dist", "typecheck": "tsc --noEmit", "deploy": "wrangler deploy", "migrate": "wrangler d1 migrations apply {project-name}-db --local", "migrate:prod": "wrangler d1 migrations apply {project-name}-db --remote" }, "dependencies": { "hono": "^4.6.15", "@{project-name}/shared": "workspace:*", "@{project-name}/database": "workspace:*" }, "devDependencies": { "@cloudflare/workers-types": "^4.20241218.0", "wrangler": "^3.97.0", "typescript": "^5.7.2" } } ``` #### 4.2 apps/api/wrangler.toml ```toml name = "{project-name}-api" main = "src/index.ts" compatibility_date = "2024-12-01" [[d1_databases]] binding = "DB" database_name = "{project-name}-db" database_id = "" # å¾Œã§wrangler d1 createã§è¨­å®š [observability] enabled = true ``` #### 4.3 apps/api/src/index.ts ```typescript import { Hono } from "hono"; import { cors } from "hono/cors"; type Bindings = { DB: D1Database; }; const app = new Hono<{ Bindings: Bindings }>(); // CORSè¨­å®š app.use("*", cors()); // ãƒ˜ãƒ«ã‚¹ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯ app.get("/health", (c) => { return c.json({ status: "ok", timestamp: new Date().toISOString() }); }); // API routes app.get("/api", (c) => { return c.json({ message: "Welcome to {project-name} API" }); }); export default app; ``` ### 5. Frontend (Remix) ã®ç”Ÿæˆ #### 5.1 apps/web/package.json ```json { "name": "@{project-name}/web", "version": "0.1.0", "private": true, "type": "module", "scripts": { "dev": "remix vite:dev", "build": "remix vite:build", "typecheck": "tsc --noEmit", "deploy": "npm run build && wrangler pages deploy ./build/client" }, "dependencies": { "@remix-run/cloudflare": "^2.15.3", "@remix-run/cloudflare-pages": "^2.15.3", "@remix-run/react": "^2.15.3", "react": "^18.3.1", "react-dom": "^18.3.1", "@{project-name}/shared": "workspace:*" }, "devDependencies": { "@remix-run/dev": "^2.15.3", "@types/react": "^18.3.18", "@types/react-dom": "^18.3.5", "typescript": "^5.7.2", "vite": "^6.0.7", "tailwindcss": "^3.4.17", "autoprefixer": "^10.4.20", "postcss": "^8.4.49" } } ``` #### 5.2 apps/web/app/root.tsx ```typescript import { Links, Meta, Outlet, Scripts, ScrollRestoration, } from "@remix-run/react"; import type { LinksFunction } from "@remix-run/cloudflare"; import "./tailwind.css"; export const links: LinksFunction = () => []; export default function App() { return ( ); } ``` #### 5.3 apps/web/app/routes/_index.tsx ```typescript import type { MetaFunction } from "@remix-run/cloudflare"; export const meta: MetaFunction = () => { return [ { title: "{Project Name}" }, { name: "description", content: "Welcome to {Project Name}!" }, ]; }; export default function Index() { return (

{Project Name}

Cloudflare Workers + Remix + D1 + Prisma

); } ``` ### 6. Database (Prisma) ã®ç”Ÿæˆ #### 6.1 packages/database/package.json ```json { "name": "@{project-name}/database", "version": "0.1.0", "private": true, "scripts": { "db:generate": "prisma generate", "migrate": "wrangler d1 migrations apply {project-name}-db --local" }, "dependencies": { "@prisma/adapter-d1": "^5.23.0", "@prisma/client": "^5.23.0" }, "devDependencies": { "prisma": "^5.23.0", "wrangler": "^3.97.0" } } ``` #### 6.2 packages/database/prisma/schema.prisma ```prisma generator client { provider = "prisma-client-js" previewFeatures = ["driverAdapters"] } datasource db { provider = "sqlite" url = "file:./dev.db" } // Example: Users table model User { id String @id email String @unique name String createdAt DateTime @default(now()) @map("created_at") updatedAt DateTime @updatedAt @map("updated_at") @@map("users") } ``` ### 7. Shared package ã®ç”Ÿæˆ #### 7.1 packages/shared/package.json ```json { "name": "@{project-name}/shared", "version": "0.1.0", "private": true, "type": "module", "main": "./dist/index.js", "types": "./dist/index.d.ts", "scripts": { "build": "tsc", "typecheck": "tsc --noEmit" }, "dependencies": { "zod": "^3.24.1" }, "devDependencies": { "typescript": "^5.7.2" } } ``` #### 7.2 packages/shared/src/index.ts ```typescript export * from "./constants/index.js"; export * from "./schemas/index.js"; ``` #### 7.3 packages/shared/src/constants/index.ts ```typescript // Project constants export const APP_NAME = "{Project Name}"; export const APP_VERSION = "0.1.0"; ``` ### 8. ãƒ‰ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã®ç”Ÿæˆ #### 8.1 README.md ```markdown # {Project Name} {Project description} ## Tech Stack - **Frontend**: Remix on Cloudflare Pages - **Backend API**: Hono on Cloudflare Workers - **Database**: D1 (SQLite) + Prisma ORM - **UI**: shadcn/ui + Tailwind CSS - **Monorepo**: Turborepo + pnpm workspaces ## Getting Started ### Prerequisites - Node.js >= 20.0.0 - pnpm >= 9.0.0 ### Installation \`\`\`bash # Install dependencies pnpm install # Generate Prisma client pnpm db:generate # Run development servers pnpm dev \`\`\` ## Project Structure See [CLAUDE.md](./CLAUDE.md) for detailed project structure and development guidelines. ## Documentation - [PLAN.md](./PLAN.md) - Project planning and roadmap - [CLAUDE.md](./CLAUDE.md) - Development guide for Claude Code ## License Private ``` #### 8.2 PLAN.md ```markdown # PLAN ## Project Overview **Project Name**: {Project Name} **Description**: {Project description} ## Tech Stack - **Frontend**: Remix on Cloudflare Pages - **Backend API**: Hono on Cloudflare Workers - **Database**: D1 (SQLite) + Prisma ORM - **UI**: shadcn/ui + Tailwind CSS - **Monorepo**: Turborepo + pnpm workspaces ## Implementation Status ### âœ… å®Ÿè£…æ¸ˆã¿æ©Ÿèƒ½ - ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆåŸºç›¤ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ— - åŸºæœ¬çš„ãªAPI/Webã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªæ§‹é€  ### ğŸ“‹ ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ãƒ­ã‚° - èªè¨¼æ©Ÿèƒ½ (Google OAuth + JWT) - ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¹ãƒã‚¤ã‚°ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ - UI ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ–ãƒ©ãƒª ## Development Principles - **KISSåŸå‰‡**: ã‚·ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ã§ä¿å®ˆã—ã‚„ã™ã„ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’å„ªå…ˆ - **YAGNIåŸå‰‡**: å¿…è¦æœ€å°é™ã®æ©Ÿèƒ½ã‹ã‚‰é–‹å§‹ã—ã€æ®µéšçš„ã«æ‹¡å¼µ - **API ãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ¼ã‚¹ãƒˆ**: ãƒ¢ãƒã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªå¯¾å¿œã‚’å‰æã¨ã—ãŸè¨­è¨ˆ ``` #### 8.3 CLAUDE.md ```markdown # {Project Name} - Claude Code Guide This document provides guidance for Claude Code instances working in this repository. ## Project Overview **{Project Name}** is a {description} built as a modern web application: - **Stack**: Cloudflare Workers (Hono) + Cloudflare Pages (Remix) + D1 (SQLite) - **Architecture**: Monorepo using Turborepo + pnpm workspaces - **Database ORM**: Prisma with D1 adapter ## Common Commands ### Development Setup \`\`\`bash # Install dependencies pnpm install # Build all packages pnpm build # Generate Prisma client pnpm db:generate # Apply migrations locally pnpm db:migrate # Start development servers pnpm dev \`\`\` ### Build & Type Checking \`\`\`bash # Build entire monorepo pnpm build # Type check all packages pnpm turbo run typecheck \`\`\` ### Database Migrations \`\`\`bash cd ./packages/database # Create migration file wrangler d1 migrations create {project-name}-db # Generate SQL diff prisma migrate diff \\ --from-local-d1 \\ --to-schema-datamodel ./prisma/schema.prisma \\ --script \\ --output ./migrations/_.sql # Apply migration locally npm run migrate \`\`\` ## References - Project plan: `PLAN.md` - Installation: `README.md` - Turborepo config: `turbo.json` - Database schema: `packages/database/prisma/schema.prisma` ``` ### 9. ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚³ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ã®å®Ÿè¡Œ ã™ã¹ã¦ã®ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆã—ãŸå¾Œã€ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚³ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ã‚’å®Ÿè¡Œã—ã¾ã™ï¼š ```bash # ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªã«ç§»å‹• cd {project-directory} # ä¾å­˜é–¢ä¿‚ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ« pnpm install # Prisma ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆç”Ÿæˆ pnpm db:generate # ãƒ“ãƒ«ãƒ‰ç¢ºèª pnpm build # å‹ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯ pnpm turbo run typecheck ``` ### 10. æ¬¡ã®ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒƒãƒ—ã®æç¤º ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—å®Œäº†å¾Œã€ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã«ä»¥ä¸‹ã®æ¬¡ã®ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚’æç¤ºã—ã¾ã™ï¼š 1. **D1ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã®ä½œæˆ**: ```bash cd apps/api wrangler d1 create {project-name}-db # å‡ºåŠ›ã•ã‚ŒãŸdatabase_idã‚’wrangler.tomlã«è¨­å®š ``` 2. **é–‹ç™ºã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã®èµ·å‹•**: ```bash pnpm dev ``` 3. **è¿½åŠ æ©Ÿèƒ½ã®å®Ÿè£…**ï¼ˆã‚ªãƒ—ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ï¼‰: - Google OAuthèªè¨¼ - shadcn/ui ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ— - åˆæœŸã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ†ã‚£ã®ä½œæˆ ## Arguments - `$ARGUMENTS` - ã‚ªãƒ—ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³å¼•æ•° - å¼•æ•°ãªã—: åŸºæœ¬çš„ãªãƒœã‚¤ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆã®ã¿ç”Ÿæˆ - `--with-auth`: Google OAuthèªè¨¼æ©Ÿèƒ½ã‚’è¿½åŠ  - `--entity `: åˆæœŸã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ†ã‚£ã‚’è¿½åŠ ï¼ˆä¾‹: `--entity Product`ï¼‰ ## Examples ```bash # åŸºæœ¬çš„ãªãƒœã‚¤ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆç”Ÿæˆ /create-cloudflare-fullstack # èªè¨¼æ©Ÿèƒ½ä»˜ãã§ç”Ÿæˆ /create-cloudflare-fullstack --with-auth # èªè¨¼+åˆæœŸã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ†ã‚£ï¼ˆProductï¼‰ /create-cloudflare-fullstack --with-auth --entity Product ``` ## Notes ### é‡è¦äº‹é … 1. **Node.js ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ§ãƒ³**: Node.js 20.0.0 ä»¥é™ãŒå¿…è¦ 2. **pnpm å¿…é ˆ**: npm/yarn ã§ã¯ãªã pnpm ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ 3. **Cloudflare ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆ**: ãƒ‡ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¤ã«ã¯Cloudflareã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆãŒå¿…è¦ 4. **D1 ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¹**: åˆå›ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—æ™‚ã«æ‰‹å‹•ã§ä½œæˆãŒå¿…è¦ ### ç”Ÿæˆã•ã‚Œã‚‹ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ« **å¿…é ˆãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«** (å¸¸ã«ç”Ÿæˆ): - âœ… Rootè¨­å®š (package.json, pnpm-workspace.yaml, turbo.json, .gitignore) - âœ… Backend API (Hono + TypeScript) - âœ… Frontend (Remix + TypeScript) - âœ… Database (Prisma schema) - âœ… Shared package (Constants, Types) - âœ… Documentation (README.md, PLAN.md, CLAUDE.md) **ã‚ªãƒ—ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³æ©Ÿèƒ½** (å¼•æ•°ã§æŒ‡å®š): - âš™ï¸ Google OAuthèªè¨¼ (`--with-auth`) - âš™ï¸ åˆæœŸã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ†ã‚£ (`--entity `) - âš™ï¸ shadcn/ui ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ— (`--with-ui`) ### ãƒˆãƒ©ãƒ–ãƒ«ã‚·ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ³ã‚° **pnpm install ãŒå¤±æ•—ã™ã‚‹**: ```bash # pnpm ã®ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’ç¢ºèª pnpm --version # å¿…è¦ã«å¿œã˜ã¦ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ãƒˆ npm install -g pnpm@latest ``` **Prisma ãŒç”Ÿæˆã§ããªã„**: ```bash # packages/database ã§ç›´æ¥å®Ÿè¡Œ cd packages/database npx prisma generate ``` **TypeScript ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼**: ```bash # å…¨ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’ãƒ“ãƒ«ãƒ‰ pnpm build # shared ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’å…ˆã«ãƒ“ãƒ«ãƒ‰ cd packages/shared pnpm build ``` ### ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒã‚¤ã‚º ã“ã®ãƒœã‚¤ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆã¯å‡ºç™ºç‚¹ã¨ã—ã¦ä½¿ç”¨ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã®è¦ä»¶ã«å¿œã˜ã¦ä»¥ä¸‹ã‚’ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒã‚¤ã‚ºã§ãã¾ã™ï¼š - files.claude-code-plugin/commands/hello.md:
---
description: Greet the user with a personalized message
---

# Hello Command

Greet the user warmly and ask how you can help them today. Make the greeting personal and encouraging.
